title:
Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site
: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site Ranger-Led House Tours      Location: Mary McLeod Bethune Council House NHS (1318 Vermont Ave NW, Washington, DC 20005) Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 02/05/2016 to 12/31/2017 The Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site offers ranger-led house tours 7 days a week from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m (the last tour leaves at 4:00 p.m.). View Details      Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site Reading Ranger Family Story Time      Location: Mary McLeod Bethune Council House NHS (1318 Vermont Ave NW, Washington, DC 20005) Fees: Free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly  from 02/08/2016 to 12/25/2017 Join National Park Service Rangers every Monday at 10:30 a.m. at the Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site for a fun and educational story time and craft activity.
